subject: RE: [junit] Class loader error with junit
msgSnippet: Typo (sorry -- like most of you care anyway ;- ) This: . . . the JVM will attempt to assign all unloaded classes referenced by a defined class to that
messageBody:
Typo (sorry -- like most of you care anyway ;-> )

This:
". . . the JVM will attempt to assign all unloaded classes referenced by a
defined class to that defining class's loader)."

Should have said:
". . . the JVM will attempt to assign all unloaded classes referenced by a
defined class to that class's defining loader)."

Scott
